content.raw:
Now that I knew where to search, I also found this:

#!/osrf/sdformat/src/default/sdf/Migration.md

which is not in sync with the other Migration document.

Also, the online documentation, does not contain all the elements which are specified in the Migration.md. E.g. the [link light element](#!/osrf/sdformat/annotate/default/Migration.md?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Migration.md-114) is not existent in the [online docs](http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.6&elem=link) for version 1.6.

Do you know which document is true about this? Furthermore: is there any reason for the duplicate information?
content.html:
Now that I knew where to search, I also found this:

#!/osrf/sdformat/src/default/sdf/Migration.md

which is not in sync with the other Migration document.

Also, the online documentation, does not contain all the elements which are specified in the Migration.md. E.g. the link light element is not existent in the online docs for version 1.6.

Do you know which document is true about this? Furthermore: is there any reason for the duplicate information?
